Uses of Class
com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager.FemObjectConfig

    • Uses of FemObjectConfig in com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager

      Methods in com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager that return FemObjectConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FemObjectConfig FemObjectConfig.dataFormat(FemDataFormat dataFormat)
      Set the data format in which the instance data will be written to the file system
      FemObjectConfig FemObjectConfig.dataStructure(FemDataStructure dataStructure)
      Set the data structure for storage of object instance data
      FemObjectConfig FemConfig.getObjectConfig(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
      This method returns the current storage configuration for given class
      FemObjectConfig FemConfig.objectConfig(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
      Get the storage configuration for the given class.
      FemObjectConfig FemObjectConfig.repository(java.lang.String alias)
      Set the alias of the repository in which this classes instance data is stored
      FemObjectConfig FemObjectConfig.resourcePath(java.lang.String resourcePath)
      Set the classes resource path within the repository The resource path is relative to the repository location so if the given resource path starts with the file separator it is removed.
      Methods in com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager that return types with arguments of type FemObjectConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
